comments.value: Description:
comments.raw: -- Description:

comments.value: Hints for the player at Club LEGO form Max.
comments.raw: -- Hints for the player at Club LEGO form Max.

comments.value: updated tgc... 6/04/10
comments.raw: -- updated tgc... 6/04/10

comments.value: set the vars for interaction. NOTE: any/all of thses are optional
comments.raw: --set the vars for interaction. NOTE: any/all of thses are optional

comments.value: Click on speech
comments.raw: -- Click on speech

comments.value: Click the arrow next to the circle at the top of the screen to see other missions you have.
comments.raw: --Click the arrow next to the circle at the top of the screen to see other missions you have.

comments.value: Check your passport for achievements to do.  Doing achievements will get you all kinds of cool stuff!
comments.raw: --Check your passport for achievements to do.  Doing achievements will get you all kinds of cool stuff!

comments.value: You can always smash yourself in the Help Menu if you want.  It's fun!
comments.raw: --You can always smash yourself in the Help Menu if you want.  It's fun!

comments.value: If you can't collect stuff, check your backpack, it might be full.
comments.raw: --If you can't collect stuff, check your backpack, it might be full.

comments.value: You can fly to anywhere in LEGO Universe from here!
comments.raw: --You can fly to anywhere in LEGO Universe from here!

comments.value: Have you tried racing yet?  Check out the race in Gnarled Forest, it's a lot of fun!
comments.raw: --Have you tried racing yet?  Check out the race in Gnarled Forest, it's a lot of fun!

comments.value: If you collect all five hidden bricks in Nimbus, you'll get a bigger backpack!
comments.raw: --If you collect all five hidden bricks in Nimbus, you'll get a bigger backpack!

comments.value: Look for flower stalks on the ground. Spray them with water and flowers will grow. Grow enough and you'll get a reward!
comments.raw: --Look for flower stalks on the ground. Spray them with water and flowers will grow. Grow enough and you'll get a reward!

comments.value: Look through all the binoculars you find, there might be a reward for you.
comments.raw: --Look through all the binoculars you find, there might be a reward for you.

comments.value: When in Nimbus Station, try playing all the instruments for thirty seconds and see what happens. Rock out!
comments.raw: --When in Nimbus Station, try playing all the instruments for thirty seconds and see what happens. Rock out!

comments.value: Be sure and explore everywhere. You'll get cool stuff for finding all the hidden areas.
comments.raw: --Be sure and explore everywhere. You'll get cool stuff for finding all the hidden areas.

comments.value: There is a Gorilla Mech in Gnarled Forest that is tough to smash. Build the bricks he pulls up from the ground into an anchor to beat him.
comments.raw: --There is a Gorilla Mech in Gnarled Forest that is tough to smash. Build the bricks he pulls up from the ground into an anchor to beat him.

comments.value: Smash all the enemies you come across.  There are added bonuses when you smash a lot of them.
comments.raw: --Smash all the enemies you come across.  There are added bonuses when you smash a lot of them.

comments.value: Read all the message plates you come across to learn more about the LEGO Universe and you'll get something special for reading them all.
comments.raw: --Read all the message plates you come across to learn more about the LEGO Universe and you'll get something special for reading them all.

comments.value: If you wear a Ninja cowl when using the rocket launcher to go to Forbidden Valley, you'll land near the tree instead of at the beginning.
comments.raw: --If you wear a Ninja cowl when using the rocket launcher to go to Forbidden Valley, you'll land near the tree instead of at the beginning.

comments.value: Proximity speech
comments.raw: -- Proximity speech

comments.value: Welcome Club LEGO Member!
comments.raw: --Welcome Club LEGO Member!

comments.value: This place is for Club LEGO members only, you're exclusive hang out spot.
comments.raw: --This place is for Club LEGO members only, you're exclusive hang out spot.

comments.value: Explore this place and have fun!
comments.raw: --Explore this place and have fun!

comments.value: Being a Club member has tons of extra benifits.
comments.raw: --Being a Club member has tons of extra benifits.

comments.value: Talk to me and I'll give you hints for the game.
comments.raw: --Talk to me and I'll give you hints for the game.
